text:
I am experimenting with events on 0.5 dev preview, and have no problems seeing the block events. I can even see my custom chaincode events in the transaction results (some of them, anyway) ... but I cannot receive my events as the peer shows this error log:
17:34:28.376 [eventhub_producer] register -> ERRO 3faf could not register eventType:CHAINCODE
Any thoughts?
